docs.snippet: A preseason opener of missed connections, sloppy blocks and offensive sluggishness showed how the Giants have struggled to find an efficient, consistent offense....
docs.lead_paragraph: A preseason opener of missed connections, sloppy blocks and offensive sluggishness showed how the Giants have struggled to find an efficient, consistent offense.
docs.abstract: New York Giants are struggling to find an efficient, consistent offense, which they relied so heavily on in 2012.

headline.main: Giants Look for Consistent Offense After Preseason Game Shows Holes

docs.abstract: Washington Redskins quarterback Robert Griffin III will miss entire preseason because of knee issues; other football news noted.

docs.snippet: Lifetime Atlanta Braves fan Ronald Lee Homer Jr. knew the stadium where he fell to his death well. He attended three or four games a month at Turner Field and watched as many televised games as he could, his father said. He always had on a Braves ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Lifetime Atlanta Braves fan Ronald Lee Homer Jr. knew the stadium where he fell to his death well. He attended three or four games a month at Turner Field and watched as many televised games as he could, his father said. He always had on a Braves hat.

headline.main: Fan Who Fell to His Death Knew Braves Stadium Well

docs.snippet: Pope Francis told the Italian and Argentine soccer teams on Tuesday that he could not decide who to back in their friendly match on Wednesday, but he urged them to set a good example in their behavior on and off the field....
